txt.en: 'My study is almost complete, [placeholder].'
The Seven Swords
Defeated the shade of Ánraig
'My work is complete. This is indeed an ancient armoury of Arnor.'
Nethraw Defeated
'But it was taken by the Hillmen of Rhudaur and turned into a place of fear.'
'Something is amiss....'
Nethraw is at the Krúsle Lannan, east of Gabilshathur.\n\nYou must place the Seven Swords in their pedestals to open the Krúsle Lannan.
'Begone, accursed spirit. A kinsman of the House of Isildur commands it!'
Search the Krúslë Lannan with Nethraw.
'Quickly, friends, let us leave this place!'
You must escape from the Krúslë Lannan with Nethraw.
'Quickly, this way!'
You must escape from Krúslë Lannan with Nethraw.
'This is no place for thy kind. Thou must leave.'
Place the Seven Swords on their pedestals
'Who dares disturb Ánraig, Lord of Rhudaur?'
Escape from Krúslë Lannan
'A kinsman of the House of Isildur maybe, but thou are not of the line of Argeleb and have not the right to treat with me.'
Protect Nethraw
'This place will be thy grave, Dúnadan!'
'Innis, do not let them pass!'
'I will not suffer thee to live!'
'The way is closed to thee.'
You have come with Nethraw into the heart of the Krúsle Lannan.
'Go.'
'Leave us, [placeholder]. This is no place for thy kind.'
'We will be the end of thee!'
'The doors have opened! Come, let us enter.'
'My study is almost complete, [placeholder].'
